# load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(rio)
library(ggplot2)
library(Hmisc)
library(lubridate)
```

# import data
```{r}
df_ml1 <- import(here("comp-data", "sci-cur-cr-lib1-data.csv")) %>% 
  mutate(batch = "lib1")
df_ml2 <- import(here("comp-data", "scicur-comp-lib2.csv")) %>% 
  mutate(batch = "lib2")
df_mc <- import(here("comp-data", "scicur-comp-con-071822-1548.csv")) %>% 
  mutate(batch = "con")
df_q <- import(here("comp-data", "scicur-comp-lib.csv"))

df_m <- rbind(df_ml1, df_ml2, df_mc)
```

```{r}
df_qc <- df_q %>% 
  clean_qualtrics() %>% 
  filter(duplicated(.) == F)

df_q %>% 
  clean_qualtrics() %>% 
  filter(duplicated(.) == T)

df_mc <- df_m %>% 
  clean_mturk()

df_q %>% 
  filter("ID" == "AS8JG1LSWTMGY")
```

```{r}
df_match <- match_dfs(df_mc, df_qc) %>% 
  clean_matchdf()

df_matchs <- df_match %>% 
  filter(submitted == 1)

approve <- df_match %>% 
  filter(submitted == 1 & match == 1)

reject <- df_match %>% 
  filter(submitted == 0)
```
